scripts.cap:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:ios:staging: npm run build:staging && CAPACITOR_HOSTNAME=staging.slushdating.com npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:ios:prod: npm run build:production && CAPACITOR_HOSTNAME=app.slushdating.com npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:android:staging: npm run build:staging && CAPACITOR_HOSTNAME=staging.slushdating.com npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:android:prod: npm run build:production && CAPACITOR_HOSTNAME=app.slushdating.com npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
